name: label
description: The label for the search field.

name: headingLevel
description: The heading level which represents an element from `<h1>` through to `<h6>`.

name: headingSize
description: The physical size of the search field title (`xl`, `l`, `m` or `s`).

name: id
description: A unique ID for the search field component.

name: name
description: The name of the form field.

name: hint
description: An optional hint to display above the form field.

name: formGroupClasses
description: Classes to add to the search form group.

name: formGroupAttributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the search form group.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the search field.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the search field.
